mapper.sql: id,rankid, ranktitle, rankbrief, rankdetail, ranklimite, rankinvolved, rankscope, rankphotos, rankrate, starttime, endtime, areaname, coordinate, isfinish, createuserid, ranktype, ispublic, rankcateid, createtime, updatetime, likescore, flowerscore, diamondscore, codeword, ptype,companyname,companyphotos,companybrief,sourcetype,joincode, joinlastday,maximprovenum,minimprovenum,ischeck,isgroup,rankcardid,isup,isdel,sponsornum, sponsormoney,rankrule,isrecommend,weight,ishomerecommend,notice,needConfirm,autotime,maxtotalimprovenum

mapper.select:
select
from rank where isdel = '0' and rankid = #{rankid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into rank (id, rankid, ranktitle, rankbrief, rankdetail, ranklimite, rankinvolved, rankscope, rankphotos, rankrate, starttime, endtime, areaname, coordinate, isfinish, createuserid, ranktype, ispublic, rankcateid, createtime, updatetime, likescore, flowerscore, diamondscore, codeword, ptype,autotime,maxtotalimprovenum) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{rankid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ranktitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rankbrief,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rankdetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ranklimite,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rankinvolved,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rankscope,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rankphotos,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rankrate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{starttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{areaname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{coordinate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isfinish,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createuserid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{ranktype,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{ispublic,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{rankcateid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{likescore,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{flowerscore,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{diamondscore,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{codeword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ptype,jdbcType=CHAR},#{autotime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{maxtotalimprovenum,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update rank
ranktitle = #{ranktitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rankbrief = #{rankbrief,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rankdetail = #{rankdetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ranklimite = #{ranklimite,jdbcType=INTEGER},
rankscope = #{rankscope,jdbcType=INTEGER},
rankphotos = #{rankphotos,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rankrate = #{rankrate,jdbcType=INTEGER},
starttime = #{starttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
endtime = #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
areaname = #{areaname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
coordinate = #{coordinate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
isfinish = #{isfinish,jdbcType=CHAR},
createuserid = #{createuserid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
ranktype = #{ranktype,jdbcType=CHAR},
ispublic = #{ispublic,jdbcType=CHAR},
rankcateid = #{rankcateid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updatetime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
likescore = #{likescore,jdbcType=INTEGER},
flowerscore = #{flowerscore,jdbcType=INTEGER},
diamondscore = #{diamondscore,jdbcType=INTEGER},
codeword = #{codeword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ptype = #{ptype,jdbcType=CHAR},
companyname = #{companyname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
companyphotos = #{companyphotos,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
companybrief = #{companybrief,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sourcetype = #{sourcetype,jdbcType=CHAR},
joinlastday = #{joinlastday},
maximprovenum = #{maximprovenum},
minimprovenum = #{minimprovenum},
ischeck = #{ischeck},
isgroup = #{isgroup},
rankcardid = #{rankcardid},
isup = #{isup},
isdel = #{isdel},
rankrule = #{rankrule},
autotime = #{autotime},
maxtotalimprovenum = #{maxtotalimprovenum},
where rankid = #{rankid,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update rank set ranktitle = #{ranktitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rankbrief = #{rankbrief,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rankdetail = #{rankdetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ranklimite = #{ranklimite,jdbcType=INTEGER}, rankinvolved = #{rankinvolved,jdbcType=INTEGER}, rankscope = #{rankscope,jdbcType=INTEGER}, rankphotos = #{rankphotos,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rankrate = #{rankrate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, starttime = #{starttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, endtime = #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, areaname = #{areaname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, coordinate = #{coordinate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, isfinish = #{isfinish,jdbcType=CHAR}, createuserid = #{createuserid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ranktype = #{ranktype,jdbcType=CHAR}, ispublic = #{ispublic,jdbcType=CHAR}, rankcateid = #{rankcateid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updatetime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, likescore = #{likescore,jdbcType=INTEGER}, flowerscore = #{flowerscore,jdbcType=INTEGER}, diamondscore = #{diamondscore,jdbcType=INTEGER}, codeword = #{codeword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ptype = #{ptype,jdbcType=CHAR}, autotime = #{autotime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, maxtotalimprovenum = #{maxtotalimprovenum,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where rankid = #{rankid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
UPDATE rank set sponsornum = (SELECT COUNT(userid) from user_sponsor), sponsormoney = (SELECT SUM(number) from user_sponsor) WHERE rankid = #{rankid,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update rank
isfinish = #{isfinish,jdbcType=CHAR},
ispublic = #{ispublic,jdbcType=CHAR},
isdel = #{isdel},
isrecommend = #{isrecommend},
ishomerecommend = #{ishomerecommend},
weight = #{weight},
needConfirm = #{needConfirm},
notice = #{notice},
autotime = #{autotime},
maxtotalimprovenum = #{maxtotalimprovenum},
updatetime = #{updatetime},
where rankid = #{rankid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select
from rank where starttime <= #{currentDate} and isfinish = 0 and isdel = 0
select distinct rankscope from rank where isdel = 0

SELECT
FROM rank r inner join rank_members rm on r.rankid = rm.rankid where rm.iswinning = 1 and r.isdel = 0 and rm.checkstatus = 3 and r.ispublic = 0 and r.isfinish = 5 group by r.rankid order by r.endtime DESC limit #{startNum},#{pageSize}
select count(1) from rankimage where isdel = 0 and ispublic = #{ispublic} and checkstatus = 1 and isup = 0 and createuserid = #{createuserid}
